name: Head2Head (Batyaggy)
description:
Head2Head is about a 2 headed sea serpent. The two heads disagree and began fighting. Gameplay revolves around shooting fireballs and once they have bounced twice, placing the serpent in the position so that the red serpent head is hit with the fireball. Later in gameplay, new objects, such as gems and bombs, are introduced.

W and Click are used to move the character forward (the character faces the mouse)

RClick is used to shoot fireballs

Spacebar is used to slow down time

This game was made for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam

Credits:

Models, textures, and animations by Daniel Tritasavit

Game design and programming by Daniel Tritasavit

Music by Jordan Tritasavit
